original_title: Poppy: Never Find My Place - Live from House of Blues
overview: On the final US date of her "Never Find My Place" tour, alt-rocker Poppy performs tracks from her latest album "Flux" along with fan favourites such as "X", "Scary Mask" and "I Disagree" at House of Blues in San Diego.
title: Poppy: Never Find My Place - Live from House of Blues
